refnamediv.refpurpose: Convert a string to an array

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
string
The input string.
split_length
Maximum length of the chunk.

&reftitle.notes;
str_split will split into bytes, rather than characters when dealing with a multi-byte encoded string.
